item.description:
Free Thursday's at the Institute for Contemporary Art (ICA).

Right now they are featuring art work from Shepard Fairey, the guy behind the famous Obama portrait and the Andre the Giant "obey" image.

http://www.icaboston....


Directions: Silverline to World Trade Center or Courthouse, and you can walk from there. Metered street parking and paid lots ($10 I think) if you are driving.

$1 group fee for this event. Pay online with Amazon Payments, or contact me by email to pay cash.
item.name: Free Thursdays at the ICA
